alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Kearney; Phelps; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:50PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Kearney, Buffalo and southern Sherman Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 550 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hazard to 7 miles north of Axtell. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ravenna and Poole. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 263 and 291. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
